text: "Life Is a Lemon and I Want My Money Back" is a radio single by Meat Loaf released in 1994. It was the second single from the album Bat Out of Hell II: Back into Hell and charted on the US Billboard Album Rock Tracks chart at number 17. ==Track listing== # "Life Is a Lemon and I Want My Money Back" (7:59) # "Good Girls Go to Heaven (Bad Girls Go Everywhere)" (6:50) ==Charts== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" !Chart (1993) !Position |- |} Category:Meat Loaf songs Category:1994 singles Category:Songs written by Jim Steinman Category:Song recordings produced by Jim Steinman Category:1993 songs Category:Virgin Records singles
